text.section: A transaction subject to this subtitle may not be made unless, within 60 days after the statement required by § 7-304 of this subtitle is filed with the Commissioner or within any extension of that period, the Commissioner approves the transaction or does not disapprove the transaction.

In disapproving a transaction based on a finding under subsection (b)(2) of this section:
the Commissioner may not disapprove a transaction subject to this subtitle if the Commissioner finds that any of the situations meeting the criteria of § 7-405(b) of this title exist;
the Commissioner may condition the approval of a transaction subject to this subtitle on the removal of the basis of disapproval under subsection (b)(2) of this section within a specified period of time; and
the disapproval is subject to § 7-405(c) of this title and the informational requirements under § 7-403(c) of this title.
